languages.text: Колодец уходит вниз — на глубину, недоступную взгляду. На стенах шахты видны следы техники, пробивавшей породу, и фрагменты древнего города, некогда ушедшего под землю.

traits.locale_text: [Дратф] Колодец шахты уходит вниз дальше, чем можно разглядеть. Повсюду можно разглядеть следы раскопок и проглядывающие из скал фрагменты древнего города.

languages.text: The well goes so deep you cannot see the bottom. The walls of the shaft reveal the marks of the machinery that drilled through the rock, as well as fragments of an ancient sunken city.
languages.original_text: Колодец уходит вниз — на глубину, недоступную взгляду. На стенах шахты видны следы техники, пробивавшей породу, и фрагменты древнего города, некогда ушедшего под землю.

traits.locale_text: The well goes so deep you cannot see the bottom. The walls of the shaft reveal the marks of the machinery that drilled through the rock, as well as fragments of an ancient city sunken city.
The well goes so deep you cannot see the bottom. The walls of the shaft reveal the marks of the machinery that drilled through the rock, as well as fragments of an ancient city sunken city.
The well goes so deep you cannot see the bottom. The walls of the shaft reveal the marks of the machinery that drilled through the rock, as well as fragments of an ancient city sunken city.
The well goes so deep you cannot see the bottom. The walls of the shaft reveal the marks of the machinery that drilled through the rock, as well as fragments of an ancient sunken city.

languages.text: 竖井很深，看不到底。井壁上有机器开凿岩石的痕迹，还有某座远古城市沉入地底时留下的残骸。
languages.original_text: The well goes so deep you cannot see the bottom. The walls of the shaft reveal the marks of the machinery that drilled through the rock, as well as fragments of an ancient sunken city.

traits.locale_text: 竖井很深，看不到底。井壁上有机器开凿岩石的痕迹，还有某座远古城市沉入地底时留下的残骸。

languages.text: El pozo es tan profundo que no puedes ver el fondo. Sus muros presentan rastros de la maquinaria que perforó la roca, así como fragmentos de una antigua ciudad hundida bajo el agua.
languages.original_text: The well goes so deep you cannot see the bottom. The walls of the shaft reveal the marks of the machinery that drilled through the rock, as well as fragments of an ancient sunken city.

traits.locale_text: El pozo es tan profundo que no puedes ver el fondo. Sus muros presentan rastros de la maquinaria que perforó la roca, así como fragmentos de una antigua ciudad hundida bajo el agua.

languages.text: 井戸は底は深すぎて見えない。立坑の壁には、岩を掘削した機械の痕跡や古代都市、沈没都市の欠片がうかがえる。
languages.original_text: The well goes so deep you cannot see the bottom. The walls of the shaft reveal the marks of the machinery that drilled through the rock, as well as fragments of an ancient sunken city.

traits.locale_text: 井戸は底は深すぎて見えない。立坑の壁には、岩を掘削した機械の痕跡や古代都市、沈没都市の欠片がうかがえる。

languages.text: Le puits s'enfonce si profondément dans le sol que vous n'en voyez pas le fond. Ses parois portent les marques de la machine qui a foré la roche et révèlent des fragments provenant d'une cité ancienne désormais enterrée.
languages.original_text: The well goes so deep you cannot see the bottom. The walls of the shaft reveal the marks of the machinery that drilled through the rock, as well as fragments of an ancient sunken city.

traits.locale_text: Le puits s'enfonce si profondément dans le sol que vous n'en voyez pas le fond. Ses parois portent les marques de la machine qui a foré la roche et révèlent des fragments provenant d'une cité ancienne désormais enterrée.

languages.text: Der Brunnen ist so tief, dass du den Boden nicht sehen kannst. Die Wände des Schachts weisen Spuren der Maschinen aus, die sich durch den Fels gebohrt haben, sowie Fragmente einer alten, versunkenen Stadt.
languages.original_text: The well goes so deep you cannot see the bottom. The walls of the shaft reveal the marks of the machinery that drilled through the rock, as well as fragments of an ancient sunken city.

traits.locale_text: Der Brunnen ist so tief, dass du den Boden nicht sehen kannst. Die Wände des Schachts weisen Spuren der Maschinen aus, die sich durch den Fels gebohrt haben, sowie Fragmente einer alten, versunkenen Stadt.

languages.text: Kuyu o kadar derin ki dibini göremiyorsun. Duvarları, kayaları delen makinenin izlerini ve batmış, kadim bir şehrin kalıntılarını gözler önüne seriyor.
languages.original_text: The well goes so deep you cannot see the bottom. The walls of the shaft reveal the marks of the machinery that drilled through the rock, as well as fragments of an ancient sunken city.

traits.locale_text: Kuyu o kadar derine iniyor ki dibini göremiyorsun. Duvarlarında, kayayı delen makinenin izleri ve de batmış, kadim bir şehrin parçacıkları görülebiliyor.
